text: Wang Dongxing (1 January 1916 â€“ 21 August 2015) was a Chinese communist politician. He served as Vice Chairman of the Communist Party of China from 1977 to 1980. He was born in Yiyang County, Jiangxi. Wang died on 21 August 2015 in Beijing, aged 99. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Chinese communist politicians Category:People from Jiangxi Category:20th-century Chinese politicians
title: Wang Dongxing
